projectDescription: building pool in backgarden. leveling ground, laying foudations, waterproofing, building pool, filling pool, chemical testing, testing, completion.

milestones.title: Ground Leveling
milestones.description: Site inspection and assessment, Clearing the area, Leveling the ground

milestones.title: Laying Foundations
milestones.description: Excavating the pool area, Setting up the foundation frame, Pouring and setting the concrete

milestones.title: Waterproofing
milestones.description: Applying waterproofing membrane, Inspecting and testing for leaks

milestones.title: Building Pool
milestones.description: Building pool walls, Installing pool floor, Installing pool filtration system

milestones.title: Filling Pool
milestones.description: Filling the pool with water, Checking and adjusting the water level

milestones.title: Chemical Testing
milestones.description: Testing water pH, Adjusting chemical levels, Retesting and adjusting as necessary

milestones.title: Final Testing and Completion
milestones.description: Final inspection and testing of the pool, Cleaning up the site, Final walkthrough with the client
